  • Constructor Details

    • Lobby

      public Lobby​(int lobbyNumber, int nPlayers, java.lang.String playerName, ServerSocket playerSocket)
      Constructor method
      Parameters:
      lobbyNumber - lobby identifier
      nPlayers - number of players the lobby can accept
      playerName - name of the player that created the lobby
      playerSocket - connection between the server and the player's client

  • Method Details

    • getPlayersName

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getPlayersName()
      Getter method for the players' names
      Returns:
      the names of all the players in the lobby

    • isAvailable

      public boolean isAvailable​(java.lang.String playerName)
      Tells the caller if the specified player is already in the lobby
      Parameters:
      playerName - Name of the player to look for
      Returns:
      true if the player is not in the lobby, false if it already is

    • getWaitingConnection

      public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​ServerSocket> getWaitingConnection()
      Getter method for waitingConnection
      Returns:
      a map of all the waiting connections

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer​(java.lang.String playerName, ServerSocket playerSocket)
      Adds a player to the lobby (by adding it to the map of waitingConnection-s)
      Parameters:
      playerName - new player's name
      playerSocket - connection between the server and the new player's client

    • isFull

      public boolean isFull()
      Tells the caller if the lobby is full of not
      Returns:
      true if the player cap has been reached, false if not

    • getNPlayers

      public int getNPlayers()
      Gets the number of players that the lobby can contain
      Returns:
      number of players the lobby can contain

    • deletePlayer

      public void deletePlayer​(java.lang.String playerName)
      Deletes a player (from the map of waitingConnections)
      Parameters:
      playerName - deleted player's name
